item.description:
Let meet and munch on BBQ....with some of the best BBQ Teams in the world!

Be sure and wear beach attire and bring a beach chair!

Here is a link to the event...
http://bbq.phantomgou...

The tickets are currently $5 ($10 at the door) and it does not include the food or drinks.

We plan on meeting in front of the entrance at 6:00 but I will provide additional contact info as the event draws closer.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the entrance...more information will be given soon so stay tuned
item.name: Phantom Gourment BBQ Beach Party at Suffok Downs
